text:
Djivan Gasparyan (var. Jivan Gasparyan; born October 12, 1928) is an Armenian musician and composer.
He plays the duduk, a double reed woodwind instrument related to the orchestral oboe. Gasparyan is known as the "Master of the duduk".
He has won four medals at UNESCO worldwide competitions (1959, 1962, 1973, and 1980). In 1973 Gasparyan was awarded the honorary title "People's Artist of Armenia".
